title: 1.7.2mcpc服务端崩溃求解决
author: kg946
txt_content:
26.12 16:44:55 [Multicraft] Server stopped
26.12 16:44:55 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO # \hs_err_pid22632.log

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (malloc) failed to allocate 91152 bytes for Chunk::new

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO #

26.12 16:44:54 [Server] INFO [error occurred during error reporting (null), id 0xc0000005]

26.12 16:44:51 [Server] INFO 2015-12-26 16:44:51,049 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream

26.12 16:44:51 [Server] INFO 2015-12-26 16:44:51,046 WARN Unable to instantiate org.fusesource.jansi.WindowsAnsiOutputStream

26.12 16:44:51 [Multicraft] Stopping server!

26.12 16:44:51 [Multicraft] Received stop command

26.12 16:44:43 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "MCPC+1.7.2(支持MOD+插件)"

26.12 16:44:43 [Multicraft] Starting server!

求解决啊，急急急，开不了服务器

replies.txt_content: 你把你服务端里的错误报告整个发上来呗

replies.author: andylizi
replies.txt_content:
mcpc服务端经典问题。
你需要安装Visual C++ Redistributable
32位下载地址：http://www.microsoft.com/zh-CN/download/details.aspx?id=5555
64位下载地址：http://www.microsoft.com/zh-CN/download/details.aspx?id=14632
注意！你的java是几位就要安装几位的，不是根据操作系统位数来定的！比如你的java是32位的，就必须安装32位的Visual C++ Redistributable
如果安装了还是不行，试着在启动参数末尾添加 --nojline
